Coerce an object to a class

Source: R/coerce.R
coerce.Rd

Coerce an object to a class

coerce(from, to, strict = TRUE)

Arguments

from, to, strict

See methods::coerce for details.

Value

Modified object of new desired class.

Examples

showMethods("coerce")

#> Function: coerce (package methods)
#> from="AnnotatedDataFrame", to="data.frame"
#> from="ANY", to="array"
